A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: ***Spoilers***\n\nThey squandered Luke & Holdo\, gave Finn an afterthought plot that didn't go anywhere\, and had Leia do a Mary Poppins impression.  Throw in some cringe Marvel movie humor and you have this movie.  The only bright spots were the Rey/Kylo story line.  I didn't hate it\, but I think JJ Abrams has some serious damage control to do for episode 9.
